547482 550952 and bang some beautiful babe?

1238739 1241686 That the technology

1241742 1246350 to replace the body wire,

1268202 1271149 This is not

1274374 1276581 It's a piece of somebody's life.

1276643 1280489 It's pure and uncut, straight

1290757 1293203 Anything. Whatever you want,

1296563 1298839 but I'm assuming

1298899 1301175 you want to ski,

1532866 1535779 the finest cop to ever get

1884751 1886162 It's going to be a big night.

1914514 1917825 almost as good as

1917884 1921764 Porno. Face it,

1946045 1948321 This may be

1948381 1950520 but friends don't have

2019953 2022399 Leonard Nero, BLS Limousine

2022455 2024594 I've arranged for

2024657 2026568 Lornette Mason,

2030129 2032769 Of course, the car's bulletproof

2055755 2057666 What the fuck are you doing?

2082915 2086362 Good. Have you ever been wired?

2097063 2100135 Yeah. You're going to love it.

2120920 2124663 I told you no wirehead shit

2133499 2136173 I'm having a hard time

2138071 2140711 I need my case.

2147180 2147846 Can we talk a little bit

2147847 2150794 Can we talk a little bit
like two rational adults?

2159926 2162167 This is cutting off

2183149 2186392 You made me lose it in front

2186452 2188398 - Are we still friends?

2194527 2198134 But you just suck people along

2199699 2201303 Don't use the time
that I'm talking...

2201367 2203142 to think about what

2206239 2209777 Lenny, your ass is always broke,

2209842 2212652 and you're getting strung-out.

2212712 2216182 It's your brain,
so do whatever you want with it.

2216249 2218490 But not on my watch,
you understand me?
2218551 2220929 I got a child, I got rent...

2223489 2225127 who doesn't send me
a dime of support.
2225191 2227728 I'm just trying to hold on here.

2228728 2231607 I know you wouldn't say this
if you didn't care about me.

2232832 2236302 You're getting out with Fumitsu,

2239539 2241951 I'll get you to the Templars

2245445 2248483 Your supervisor has recommended

2248548 2251495 called the Retinal Fetish.

2279612 2280784 Can you take care of him?

2383916 2387125 Come to peddle me some clips

2387186 2389496 or just making a few extra bucks

2399565 2401875 Too bad about your guy Jeriko.

2404103 2407380 Show some respect.

2407440 2410853 Important for your label,

2410910 2414653 His records will sell out now,

2419652 2422394 It's not a good idea right now.

2422455 2424366 I just gotta talk to you

2425591 2428367 That's! be between me and Faith.

2431030 2433943 Funny, I don't feel anything
between you and Faith.

2439271 2441615 You assume there's something

2441674 2443950 You assume
that you have a life...

2444010 2447480 when, in fact, you peddle pieces

2447546 2450686 and the broken parts

2463929 2467035 You shouldn't talk to him

2469135 2472810 You are too goddamn paranoid.

2472872 2477582 Paranoia's just...

2534667 2537477 No. Any day now. I just know it.

2849915 2851360 You have to get out of here.

2861360 2863306 He's such a control freak now...

2868100 2869807 Yeah, for about a month now.

2878243 2880883 Stop trying to rescue me.

2880946 2882892 I'm a big girl now.

2884450 2887488 I don't need saving.

2924123 2926763 It's just a job.

2937703 2940343 I figured I could take

2940405 2942351 you wouldn't believe
